txt.en: 'Wargs are already twisted creatures, but Lhudblath was worse than any of whom I have heard tell. The Wildwood is still dangerous, but you have done a great deed this day and made these forests slightly safer.'
Linnet is located in the south-central Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Linnet Redholm.
Wargs roam the Wildwood, but none are as fierce nor as deadly as Lhudblath, the Silver Warg.
Lhudblath the Silver Warg can be found in the eastern Wildwood.\n\nLinnet has asked you to defeat the Silver Warg, Lhudblath.

'The stories of Lhudblath, the Silver Warg, speak of how the creature seems to form out of mist, attacking the unwary and leaving carnage in his wake. You would do a great service to those less able than you, if you were to defeat this monster.'
